c.t: § 715-3 Form of management of chartered business.
c.sp: library|Code of the Menominee Indian Tribe|IV|715|715-3

c.x: The form of management of the chartered business shall be a Board of Truste
The Board shall consist of five enrolled members appointed by majority vote
Business background in profit-making venture.
Familiarity with marketing or similar type business operation.
Of demonstrated good, moral, honest, reputable character, and can withstand
An enrolled member of the Menominee Tribe.
Qualifications for Board membership shall be:
Removal. Any Trustee may be removed by a majority vote of the Tribal Legisl
Vacancies. A vacancy on the Board shall be filled by the Tribal Legislature
